org.apache.cassandra.hadoop

Class ReporterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.StatusReporter
      • org.apache.cassandra.hadoop.ReporterWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Reporter, org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable

    public class ReporterWrapper
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.StatusReporter
implements org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Reporter
    A reporter that works with both mapred and mapreduce APIs.
